cause.description:
this facebook cause is for animal abuse, and we need to learn it needs to stop
if a human is abused the person who abused them is most likely going to jail, it should be the same way as animals
tell me what you think about michael vick
expand on anything topic about animal abuse. if u have any past that you would like to share if you have done something about animal abuse please write on the wall.
please write on the wall eitherway!
1. animal cruelty is wrong
2. people who support any animal abuse should be put in jail
cause.name: Animal Cruelty
